name: Minecraft 2D (Dennis xm)
description:
Minecraft 2D is a Minecraft fan-game reimagining the game as a 2D side scroller! Think of it like Paper Minecraft, but made to be more playable.

I would try to add a web version, but the game is apparently to big (the desktop version isn't)

FEATURES

Minecraft 2D has many cool things that you might not see in other Minecraft clones in the second dimension, like:

- World generation

- World saving and loading

- Texture packs

- Skins

- An actual title screen

- Settings

- And more!

VERSION UPDATE

Minecraft 2D is currently in version 0.1.1, here are some of the new features (this was a bugfix, so not too much):

- Fixed a game-breaking bug were the game would crash when you tried to create a new world

- Moved the skin button to the pause menu

CONTROLS

Move - A/D

Jump - Space

Sprint - Control

Build - Right Click

Break - Left Click

Swap between layers - Shift

Open chat - T

Pause - Escape

CHEATS

The game only has one command right now, which is /give (because there isn't a creative mode right now). The player character is addressed as "Player" or any of the '@' things (@a, @p, @s, @e, @r).
